Send message by pressing ENTER: Xa lus los ntawm nias ENTER
Enable mic to give voice input: Pab mic los muab lub suab tawm tswv yim
Enable speech output only for speech inp: Pab kom hais lus tso tawm rau cov lus hais lus xwb
Enable speech output regardless of input: Pab kom hais lus tso tawm tsis hais cov hom input
Select backend server for the app: Xaiv backend neeg rau zaub mov rau app
Add address to connect to Hardware: Ntxiv chaw nyob mus txuas rau Hardware
Change Server: Hloov cov neeg rau zaub mov
Please login again to change SUSI server: Thov nkag rov qab hloov SUSI neeg rau zaub mov
Reset Speech Rate: Rov hais dua Tus Ntaus Tus Ntaus
Reset the speed at which the text is spo: Pib dua qhov kev ceev ntawm qhov cov ntawv nyeem tau hais
Reset the pitch at which the text is spo: Pib dua lub suab uas cov ntawv nyeem tau hais rau lub neej ntawd
Play a short demonstration of speech syn: Ua si ua luv luv ntawm kev hais lus synthesis
Use Custom Server: Siv Kev Cai Neeg Ntiag Tug
Please enter a valid URL first: Thov sau ib qho URL thawj zaug
Please verify that Susi Hardware is runn: Thov tshawb xyuas tias Susi Hardware yog khiav ntawm qhov chaw koj tau hais
Enter a valid Address: Sau qhov chaw nyob uas siv tau
Enter Socket Web Address: Ntaus Qhov Chaw Sau Ntawv Socket
Login Failed. Try Again: ID nkag mus Ua tsis tau. Rov sim dua
Some error occurred. Try Again: Qee qhov yuam kev tshwm sim. Rov sim dua
Please check your internet connection: Thov kos koj qhov internet txuas
Enter a valid URL: Sau ib qhov URL siv tau
Minimum 6 characters required: Yam tsawg kawg yuav tsum tau 6 cim
Email already taken. Please try with ano: Email twb tau txais lawm. Thov sim nrog lwm tus email.
If you have an Account Please Login: Yog tias koj muaj ib qho Qhib Thov nkag
Check your password again: Ntsuam xyuas koj tus password dua
Invalid Credentials. Please check your E: Cov Ntawv Pov Thawj Raug Cai. Thov saib koj Email lossis Password.
Failed. Try Again: Ua tsis tau. Rov sim dua
This Field Is Required: Lub Tebchaws No yog yuav tsum tau ua
Message Background Image URL: Xov Xwm Tom Qab Cov Yav Tom Ntej URL
Select Server: Xaiv cov neeg rau zaub mov
Expand your experience get closer and st: Nthuav koj txoj kev paub zoo dua qub thiab nyob twj ywm tam sim no
We will text a verification code to this: Peb yuav muab cov ntaub ntawv pov thawj rau tus xov tooj no. Tus nqi them rau SMS yuav thov tau.
